name: Digital Figure Iina
overview: Digital Figure Iina tells the story of an alien girl that is send to earth to become a human idol. She is found by the owner of an art academy and took her to her mansion. The player can choose what clothes Iina is going to wear each week and also talk to her to know how she feels (and that will make her better or worse depending of the choices in the conversations). The mansion is the art academy and is divided into different floors and in each floor there are the different teachers and the other students. Each week the player can decide what Iiana is going to do: She can learn different things to improve her stats, like take photographs sessions, piano lessons, singing lessons, modeling, gymnastic, study, dancing lessons, etc. There will be times where the people will value Iina and depending of her stats she will reach different things (like being in a magazine, actress, auditions, festivals, etc.) The game got a time limit of 3 years to reach the goal.
